Package edu.stanford.math.plex_plus.utility

Class Summary
ArrayUtility This class contains static helper functions for manipulating arrays.
BitPacking  
CRC The CRC class provides good hash methods for int/long and string data.
ExceptionUtility This class contains static functions for aiding in creating exceptions, and verifying exceptions.
Infinity This static class is used for handling infinite values.
MathUtility This class contains various static utility functions relating to math.
Quicksort This class contains an implement of the quicksort and other related algorithms, such as the selection of order statistics.
Quicksort.GenericArray<T>  
Quicksort.GenericList<T>  
Quicksort.Int  
RandomUtility This class contains static members for generating random numbers.
